title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 13 - Judicial reprimand of probationer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 13 - Judicial reprimand of probationer

State Regulations

Sec. 410.40 C.P.L. FORM 13
(Judicial Reprimand
of Probationer)
1/87
JUDICIAL REPRIMAND OF PROBATIONER
APPLICATION
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF ________)
________, being duly sworn, deposes and
says: I am a probation officer with the ____________
Department of Probation. I am responsible for
[County]
supervising the probation of
____________
[Name of Probationer]
who was convicted of (adjudicated a youthful
offender for the act of)
[Date of conviction], on
______
[Name of Court] by the ________, and was
sentenced by
[Name of Judge/Justice]
to ________. Based upon the following petitioner's failure
to ____________
____________
____________, pursuant to C.P.L. §§410.20
______
[County] Department of Probation requests the

Court to
order probationer personally to appear before
the Court at the time and place set forth below. ______________
(Signature)

Sworn to before me this
________ day of ________, 19________. ______________
Notary Public
COURT ORDER
The above application by the ____________
Department of
[County]
Probation is granted. The probationer is
directed to appear before the Court on ________ at ________ (a.m.) (p.m.) in

Part ________ at ________. This order shall be (mailed to) (served personally
upon) the probationer. ______________
Judge (Justice)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
NOTICE TO PROBATIONER
YOU HAVE BEEN ORDERED TO APPEAR BEFORE THE
COURT AT THE ABOVE TIME AND PLACE. FAILURE TO APPEAR AS ORDERED WITHOUT
REASONABLE CAUSE THEREFOR CONSTITUTES A VIOLATION OF THE CONDITIONS OF YOUR
SENTENCE OF PROBATION, AND MAY RESULT IN REVOCATION OF YOUR PROBATION AND
ISSUANCE OF A WARRANT DIRECTING THAT YOU BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY AND BROUGHT
BEFORE THE COURT. Date mailed () served upon ()
probationer:________, 19 ________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
